#summary Register a user in the TokBox system

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_guest

==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||firstname||string||First name of the user who is registering. First name must be greater than 1 character long.||
|| ||lastname||string||Last name of the user who is registering. Last name must be greater than 1 character long.||
|| ||email||string||E-Mail of the user who is registering. The e-mail must be a valid e-mail address, and will need to be validated.||
</table>

==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
|| ||No First Name Given||Please enter your first name||
|| ||First Name Length Too Short||First name is minimum 2 characters||
|| ||No Last Name Given||Please enter your last name||
|| ||Last Name Length Too Short||Last name is minimum 2 characters||
|| ||Invalid Email Format||Email is not in a valid format||
|| ||EMAIL_TAKEN||That email is already in use||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <registerUser firstname="wgtxhj" lastname="upxrur" email="zhtjkd@example.com">
          <userid>#####</userid>
          <jabberId>#####@jabber.dev.tokbox.com</jabberId>
          <firstname>wgtxhj</firstname>
          <lastname>upxrur</lastname>
          <username>wgtxhj0</username>
          <secret>70d32197eaec396449258bbad2a6011c</secret>
          <widgetId>dwkzgkiple</widgetId>
     </registerUser>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/users/register</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="####"/>
     <timer startTime="1222158445.2391" execTime="981.14418983459"/>
</tokResult>
}}}
